sections.heading: Monies paid to or for parent; court approval; attorney fees; accounting; disallowance; exception8-114
sections.text: Monies paid to or for parent; court approval; attorney fees; accounting; disallowance; exceptionA. The court may approve any monies paid to a parent of a child placed for adoption or another person
